mapper.select: SELECT b.bom_no, b.bom_quantity, m1.m_name, m1.m_info, m1.m_stock, m2.m_name as m_nameb, m2.m_info as m_infob, m2.m_stock as m_stockb, p.goods_name, p.goods_standard, p.goods_contents, b.bom_product_no, b.bom_material_no, b.bom_quantityb, b.bom_material_nob FROM produce_bom b JOIN produce_goods p ON b.bom_product_no = p.goods_no JOIN material m1 ON b.bom_material_no = m1.m_no JOIN material m2 ON b.bom_material_nob = m2.m_no ORDER BY bom_no DESC

SELECT b.bom_no, b.bom_quantity, m.m_name, m.m_info, m.m_stock, p.goods_name, p.goods_standard, p.goods_contents, b.bom_product_no, b.bom_material_no, b.bom_quantityb, b.bom_material_nob FROM produce_bom b JOIN produce_goods p ON b.bom_product_no = p.goods_no JOIN material m ON b.bom_material_no = m.m_no WHERE goods_no = #{goodsNo}
SELECT 'BOM_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(bom_no,-4)),0)+1,4,0) as bom_no FROM produce_bom WHERE bom_no LIKE 'BOM_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'rrrr')||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce_bom ( bom_no, bom_quantity, bom_product_no, bom_material_no, bom_quantityb, bom_material_nob ) VALUES ( #{bomNo}, #{bomQuantity}, #{bomProductNo}, #{bomMaterialNo}, #{bomQuantityb}, #{bomMaterialNob} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE produce_bom
bom_quantity = #{bomQuantity},
bom_product_no = #{bomProductNo},
bom_material_no = #{bomMaterialNo},
bom_quantityb = #{bomQuantityb},
bom_material_nob = #{bomMaterialNob},
WHERE bom_no = #{bomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT m_no, m_name FROM material ORDER BY m_no
SELECT goods_no, goods_name FROM produce_goods ORDER BY goods_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material_io (mio_no, mio_date, mio_quantity, mio_progress) VALUES( (SELECT bom.bom_material_no FROM produce_plan plan JOIN produce_goods goods ON goods.goods_no = plan.plan_product_no JOIN produce_bom bom ON bom.bom_product_no = goods.goods_no WHERE plan_no = #{planNo}), sysdate, (SELECT (plan.plan_quantity * bom.bom_quantity)/goods.goods_standard as planed_qntt FROM produce_plan plan JOIN produce_goods goods ON goods.goods_no = plan.plan_product_no JOIN produce_bom bom ON bom.bom_product_no = goods.goods_no WHERE plan_no = #{planNo}), find_code_name('출고완료'))

INSERT INTO material_io (mio_no, mio_date, mio_quantity, mio_progress) VALUES( (SELECT bom.bom_material_nob FROM produce_plan plan JOIN produce_goods goods ON goods.goods_no = plan.plan_product_no JOIN produce_bom bom ON bom.bom_product_no = goods.goods_no WHERE plan_no = #{planNo}), sysdate, (SELECT (plan.plan_quantity * bom.bom_quantityb)/goods.goods_standard as planed_qntt FROM produce_plan plan JOIN produce_goods goods ON goods.goods_no = plan.plan_product_no JOIN produce_bom bom ON bom.bom_product_no = goods.goods_no WHERE plan_no = #{planNo}), find_code_name('출고완료'))
